Appetizer.title: Lol Imagone but in English
Appetizer.description: Fried calamari in a fennel and oregano seasoned flour mixture, accompanied by a mild-spicy mayonnaise and harissa sauce. Served with a fresh salad with a delicious lemon-honey dressing.

Appetizer.title: CALAMARI GANG
Appetizer.description: Fried fries in a fennel and oregano seasoned flour mixture, accompanied by nuts.

MainCourse.title: RISOTTO WITH TRUFFLES
MainCourse.description: Risotto, butter, truffle cream, parmesan, fresh truffle strips.

MainCourse.title: SPANISH TIGER PRAWNS
MainCourse.description: Shrimps, garlic, chili, paprika, lemon, parsley.

MainCourse.title: TAPAS
MainCourse.description: Homemade schiacciata gratinated with tomato sauce, shrimp in garlic oil, milk cream and prosciutto croquettes, pimento de padron.

MainCourse.title: TAPAS
MainCourse.description: Homemade schiacciata gratinated with tomato sauce, shrimp in garlic oil, milk cream and prosciutto croquettes, pimento de padron.

MainCourse.title: TERIYAKI STIR FRY WITH BEEF TENDERLOIN
MainCourse.description: Buckwheat soba noodles, tenderloin marinated in soy sauce with ginger, garlic, and chili; bell peppers, carrots, green onions, shimeji mushrooms, baby corn, asparagus.

Dessert.title: Laurentia Illioni
Dessert.description: Fried calamari in a fennel and oregano seasoned flour mixture, accompanied by a light spicy mayonnaise and harissa sauce. The dish is enhanced by a fresh salad mix with a delicious lemon and honey dressing.

Beverage.title: Doamne Ajuta Drink
Beverage.description: Homemade schiacciata gratinated with tomato sauce, shrimp in garlic oil, milk cream and prosciutto croquettes, pimento de padron.

Beverage.title: Laurentius Water
Beverage.description: Fried calamari in a fennel and oregano seasoned flour mixture, accompanied, with a delicious lemon and honey dressing.

Beverage.title: Paulis Quotes - Chinese
Beverage.description: Pauli is a famous wimp, and accordingly, his quote is also wimpy. He says: 'I am gay and that's okay!'

Drinks.title: Doamne Ajuta Getränk
Drinks.description: Schiacciata făcută în casă gratinată cu sos de tomate, creveți în ulei cu usturoi, crochete din cremă de lapte și prosciutto, pimento de padron.

Drinks.title: Laurentiuss Wasser
Drinks.description: Calamari prăjiți într-un mix de făină aromatizată cu fenicul și oregano, acompaniați, cu dressing delicios de lămâie și miere.

Drinks.title: Paulis Zitate - Chinesisch
Drinks.description: Pauli ist ein berühmter schwuchtel und dementsprechend ist sein Zitat auch schwul. Er sagt: 'Ich bin schwul und das ist auch gut so!'
